alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 11:17AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yavapai County through 1145 AM MST... At 1116 AM MST, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Prescott Gateway Mall, or near Prescott. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Prescott, Prescott Valley, Yavapai Campground, Downtown Prescott, Groom Creek Subdivision, Indian Hill West Prescott, Oak Knoll Village, Prescott Gateway Mall, Iron Springs, White Spar Campground and Lynx Lake Dam. This includes the following highways... State Route 89 between mile markers 308 and 317. State Route 69 between mile markers 291 and 296. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
